name: Fix It Up!
description:
Do you want to fully immerse yourself into a video game?

Well, then this game is for you. It's a game in which you have to fix your game console before you are actually able to play it!

You insert the game cartridge to find out it doesn't work, so you work on fixing it! The finale is a game of asteroids.

Controls:
  • B - Blow the cartridge
  • C - Open up the game console
  • Left Mouse click - Solder 
Game was developed using Game Maker during Global Game Jam 2020
